paint

Class CustomTab

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.control.Tab
      • paint.CustomTab
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class CustomTab
extends javafx.scene.control.Tab
    This class is responsible for making tabs in Paint.

    • Property Summary

      • Properties inherited from class javafx.scene.control.Tab

        closableProperty, contentProperty, contextMenuProperty, disabledProperty, disableProperty, graphicProperty, idProperty, onClosedProperty, onCloseRequestProperty, onSelectionChangedProperty, selectedProperty, styleProperty, tabPaneProperty, textProperty, tooltipProperty

      • Fields inherited from class javafx.scene.control.Tab

        CLOSED_EVENT, SELECTION_CHANGED_EVENT, TAB_CLOSE_REQUEST_EVENT

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CustomTab(java.lang.String label) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearImage()
      Clears whatever the opened image is for the tab, it is made obsolete by the fact Paint is no longer a single image editor, but is here for historical reasons.
      void redo()
      Redo the last action that was undone.
      void setImage(javafx.scene.image.Image img)
      Sets this Tab's image to be whatever Image object is provided; calls updateDimensions, then draws the image using the Tab's imgcanvas.
      void setScrollPrefSize(double x, double y)
      Set the ScrollPane's preferred size, this method is called whenever either of the zoom methods are called, as to keep the imgcanvas and the scrollpane the same size.
      void undo()
      Undo the last edit on the imgcanvas.

    • Method Detail

      • setImage

        public void setImage(javafx.scene.image.Image img)
        Sets this Tab's image to be whatever Image object is provided; calls updateDimensions, then draws the image using the Tab's imgcanvas.
        Parameters:
        img - The image object you want to be in this tab

      • clearImage

        public void clearImage()
        Clears whatever the opened image is for the tab, it is made obsolete by the fact Paint is no longer a single image editor, but is here for historical reasons.

      • setScrollPrefSize

        public void setScrollPrefSize(double x,
                              double y)
        Set the ScrollPane's preferred size, this method is called whenever either of the zoom methods are called, as to keep the imgcanvas and the scrollpane the same size.
        Parameters:
        x - The width
        y - The height

      • undo

        public void undo()
        Undo the last edit on the imgcanvas.

      • redo

        public void redo()
        Redo the last action that was undone.
